          <title>
            <string language="en">Wastes produced from coal-fired power stations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergeudungen produzierten aus kohlebeheizten 
Kraftwerken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pertes produites à partir des centrales 
électriques à charbon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os desperdícios produziram das estações de 
potência coal-fired</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli sprechi hanno prodotto dalle centrali 
elettriche a carbone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόβλητα που παράγονται από τους με κάρβουνο σταθμούς
παραγωγής ηλεκτρικού ρεύματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Basuras producidas de centrales eléctricas con 
carbón</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how solid wastes and waste gases are produced from burning fuel in a coal-fired power station.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">power stations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solid wastes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">soot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">waste gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Feststoff- und Abgase 
aus brennendem Kraftstoff in einem kohlebeheizten Kraftwerk produziert
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment des déchets 
solides et les gaz de rebut sont produits à partir du carburant 
brûlant dans une centrale électrique à charbon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como os desperdícios 
contínuos e os gáses waste são produzidos de combustível ardente 
em uma estação de potência coal-fired.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come i gas di scarico 
e del rifiuto solido sono prodotti da combustibile burning in una 
centrale elettrica a carbone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς τα στερεά απόβλητα
και τα αέρια αποβλήτων παράγονται από το κάψιμο των καυσίμων σε 
έναν με κάρβουνο σταθμό παραγωγής ηλεκτρικού ρεύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo las basuras 
sólidas y los gases inútiles se producen del combustible ardiente en
una central eléctrica con carbón.</string>
          </description>
